articles.description: In a partnership with the Department of Health and Human Services, pharmacies like Albertsons and Vons will be receiving the COVID-19 vaccine, once approved for administration in the United States.
articles.content:
Pharmacies along the Central Coast may be getting the COVID-19 vaccine by the end of the year.
